title: Species richness - total number of species present

content.description:
Directions: Each of the questions or incomplete statements below is followed by five suggested answers or completions. Select the one that is best in each case.

A one-hectare pond is sampled in early September. The sample yields 1 small catfish as well as 17 benthic invertebrates that represent 10 species.
content.question: Which of the following can be estimated from the sample for the invertebrates in the pond?

choices.label: The uniformity of species distribution in the pond

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain environmental concepts, processes, or models in applied contexts.
